help.desc: Shows this help message, or help for a specific command.

cart clear.desc: Removes all items in your current cart for a fresh start.

cart build.desc:
Helps you build your cart using the menu.

To add an item, select the item from the dropdown menu and click the `Add Item` button.

To remove an item, select the item from the dropdown menu and click the `Remove Item` button.
Press `Next` to see the next page of the menu and `Previous` to see the previous page of the menu.

cart view.desc: Shows you all the items in your current cart.

place_order.desc:
Places your order and sends it to the restaurant.

You will be prompted to confirm your order before it is sent and after confirmation, you will be given an invoice to pay for your order. 

Once you have paid, your order will be sent to the restaurant

tip.desc: Sends a tip to the restaurant.

tictactoe.desc: Play a game of Tic Tac Toe

menu.desc: Shows the menu for the restaurant.
